system.descriptionText: +5 Ballistic Skill, +5 Willpower, -5 Intelligence, -5 Fellowship. Gain Secret Tongue (Military) and Common Lore (War) as Trained Skills. Gain one Appropriate Hatred Talent for an enemy that the Fortress world often fought against. Gain Basic Weapon Training (Las or SP) and Nerves of Steel Talent. Suffer -5 to Social Interaction Tests regarding non-combat topics.
